relevant_findings.general: Alert, male, in no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, PERRL, MMM, oropharynx clear.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, ronchi.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, bowel sounds present.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema.
relevant_findings.skin: Chronic venous stasis changes over the lower extremities bilaterally.
relevant_findings.back: Tenderness to palpation along T11-T12 spinous processes.
relevant_findings.neurological: Unable to complete cranial nerve exam secondary to patient's agitation. Strength intact in biceps, triceps, hip flexors, plantar flexions/dorsiflexion at the ankles bilaterally. Sensation to light touch grossly intact in the lower extremities and thighs bilaterally. Left patellar reflex 3+, right patellar reflex.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant weight loss of 60 pounds over the past 4 months.
